reviews.review_msg: The grading criteria were vague and lacked integrity

The teacher would clarify the expectations or give hints on the exams. Her lectures were recorded but she usually read off the slides in monotone. There is no need to attend lectures if you can keep up your own pace. The exam questions were fair and easier compared with another teacher. She needs to be more respectful to her students.

Lectures are HEAVY so stay on top of it. Dr. Northwood has so much character and kept me intrigued the entire course. She's clear on what is and isn't on the exam. Canvas quiz questions have unlimited tries/time limit and are sometimes on the exam. Best prof I've ever taken and excited to take my 3rd class with her in the Spring term.

Ahh Dr. Northwood is by far the best prof I've had at SFU! She explains concepts very clearly and in different ways to ensure every student understands the material. She also does amazing review sessions before exams where she highlights the most important information. I would take another class with her in a heartbeat!
